Chicken alfredo recipe

Ingredients:

  • Chicken
  • noodles
  • seasoning
  • Hot water
  • Alfredo sauce

    • Steps:

  • Boil the noodles, then drain them after draining place in bowl.
  • Cook chicken for 2-3 mintues and season well.
  • Place noodles with chicken mix with alfredo sauce.

    This is my favorite recipe because its so easy quick and fullfilling

    recipe https://bellyfull.net/chicken-alfredo-recipe/
